Component.name: GrabbableNoRotation
Component.Description: Similar to the Grabbable component, but applies zero rotation. To be used in conjunction with the Spinnable component (which instead handles the rotation).

BooleanAttribute.name: enabled
BooleanAttribute.description: Whether or not the grabbable functionality is enabled.

BooleanAttribute.name: isGrabbed
BooleanAttribute.description: Used by system to track component state. You should not set this manually, and always use the default value.
